promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute rare deer psychic-type pokemon wearing violet hypnotic gemstones. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or deer. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemstag, a a chibi cute rare deer psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Shadow Punch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "deer", "psychic" or "Gemstag". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, deer-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Enchanting and elusive, Gemstag uses its mind powers to strike unseen from the shadows. This svelte forest monarch is often found reigning within castle ruins.
